extendedInfo.description: Merry Xmas, and enjoy elf city Christmas in this holidayWelcome to Elf City where you and your friends can create your new civilization on this wonderful planet.build and decorate your city with Great Villa,Palace,Town Hall and Arch. Check the screenshots for sample of wonderful cities.come and visit others to praise their city. add friends then you can praise moreProvides:* over 80 home, public buildings, decorations and market, and also temple run.* design and build your city with your imagination.* send gifts to your friends.* praise other's city and also get bonus by collect them* notification when goods are sold.* gain coins when your sold goods.Rate me 5 if you like this game. email us if any suggestionsPlease Contact us if you have payment problems. you can click'send email to developer' on the market or directly to happygamesglobal@gmail.com.  and tell us yourorder number and FID. V1.00* fix the visit button in news feed and message broad* add task system that get rewards when you finished* add top user ranks by level, happiness and so on.* add notification for vistor and messages* support delete friends* support tablet now. full tested on xoom* add citizen that walk on our city. you can try to talk with them.* support get free coins by share this game, via tapjoy, and give us valuable feedbacks* enlarge the size of map

reviews.comment: Ok for the time waster kinda game it is.  As always if you want the good stuff you need to spend some money on \"gems\". There should be a way of earning those in game...but eh it\'s not a bad game
reviews.author: Strider Weston

reviews.title: Cute game
reviews.comment: Its a cute game, I like it a lot. I play through out the day. I don\'t like that the expansions cost gems. I don\'t have the money to buy gems or the space on my phone to earn free gems. It would be great if expantions could be aquired with coins.
reviews.author: Melissa Jacobson

reviews.title: Won\'t work on SG Note 2. N 7100
reviews.comment: Menus dont open up. Images & building pkacements are ofg. Lousy bell like music. Excelkent promo but a bummer experience.
reviews.author: Sarah Sever

reviews.title: Late night fun
reviews.comment: It took me a minute to learn what to do...now, im addicted. Fun to build &  Ive met an enjoy visiting my friends via memo walls :-) come play :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FROM-\342\231\245Fairyland\342\231\245 level 99
reviews.comment: This was a great game with great ppl...but you ppl need to get off your a**es and upgrade this game so that we can open it on our devices....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not the same
reviews.comment: Ever since my HTC rezound updated, all menus are compressed.  Can no longer leave messages or see who has visited my city.  About ready to give up!!  Not compatible with Android 4.0.  Please update so we can continue to play!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great fun!
reviews.comment: Like most free games, can take a while to progress unless you spend money.  But still entertaining. Since my Samsung Epic 2 got updated to Android 4.0, all menus and pop-ups are compressed horizontally, making them impossible to read.  And as a bonus, the contact email address provided on the download page has been deactivated.  Not gonna waste my time trying to find a valid email address for these people. And, they don\'t show this game on their website, so I guess they aren\'t supporting it anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Most of my buildings disappeared into the thin air!!!! What shall I do to get them back? Can it be a temporary error of the game? Please help me to solve my problem! I am desperate!!!!\tMost of my buildings disappeared into the thin air!!! What shall I do to get them back??? Can it be a temporary error of the game? Please help me!!! I am desperate!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitch?
reviews.comment: Theres somethin wrong with this app, words are squished together and over lapping, whole pictures are cut out n stuff... Wtf?? Not worth ky time, I\'ll download somethin else.
reviews.author: Jane Doe

reviews.comment: This game does not tell u how to collect praise so u will get stuck.
reviews.author: Brianne Rizzio

reviews.title: Wow!!!
reviews.comment: This game is uber-fun, can\'t get the tab joy to work though... 5 stars.
reviews.author: Cole Pettigrew

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this game.Only complaint is the same complaint I have with all the games and that is it costs too much to get the good things in the game.I refuse to spend money on any game.That\'s why I can only get so far in these games and then can\'t go on because not enough gems,acorns,jewels or whatever the game has.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: But I don\'t have money to buy gems hopefully gems can be earned by completing a Task that would be great but other then that the game is great. I love it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Becuz it only takes a little space in ur memory and it\'s easy to play. I recomend for some ppl who wants a city building game and only small space used :)  Pls keep this game running.
reviews.author: jeanneth padilla

reviews.title: Good but..
reviews.comment: I.love the game much more than I thought I was going to.(: but I dont.like how u.have to pay or download another game for gems. Change that and it will be perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Royville
reviews.comment: EC rcvs 4.5 stars from me                     only because there is ALWAYS, room for adjust/correct. NOTHING is                   perfect.....other than that, I love this game.....
reviews.author: Don Frasier

reviews.title: elf city is awsome game,i love that no one steals away ur hard work
reviews.comment: Love playn on a daily basis ,im tryn to all friends what beatiful grafic work,unique items love playn,n so wil u

reviews.title: Bad update
reviews.comment: List of things that have gone wrong since the latest update: market notifications, praises sticking, collecting praises. This is ontop network errors when editing & when submitting anything longer than two sentences on message boards. Fix please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Liking it.....
reviews.comment: So far. Getting a but addictive with it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s addicting.
reviews.comment: Awesome game I really like it.
reviews.author: Autumn Achenbach
